name: Kill the King (World Weaver)
description: This is a short twine game I made for a class in college. You play as an assassin whose goal is to kill the current regent, a powerful sorcerer. There are a few different ways to go about this, offering different endings. Take time to explore the town or go straight to the castle and your target. It's not perfect, or what I initially envisioned, so I may return to develop it more in the future. Still, I hope you enjoy! Feel free to leave any feedback for improvement!
